name: 캣 카우 스트레칭
prompt: Minimalist vector illustration of Cat-Cow stretch: person on all fours alternating between arching back upward (cat) and dropping belly down (cow), showing both positions, side view, clean lines, white background

name: 버드독
prompt: Minimalist vector illustration of Bird Dog exercise: person on all fours extending opposite arm forward and leg backward parallel to floor, maintaining neutral spine, side view, clean lines, white background

name: 데드버그
prompt: Minimalist vector illustration of Dead Bug exercise: person lying on back with arms extended toward ceiling and knees bent 90 degrees above hips, extending opposite arm and leg, side view, clean lines, white background

name: 힙 힌지 (굿모닝)

name: 플랭크

name: 사이드 플랭크

name: 니 투 체스트 스트레칭

name: 페이스 풀

name: 익스터널 로테이션
prompt: Minimalist vector illustration of External Rotation: person with elbow bent 90 degrees at side, rotating forearm outward away from body, front view, clean lines, white background
